answers.answer: Hi,How are you feeling today?Please get a blood sugar test done to rule out diabetes. Other causes that need to be excluded are fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome, excessive stress and anxiety.I would suggest you to take OTC pain killers and consult your PCP as soon as you can.Take care!
